message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe is worth a lot to you. I'm offering it to you for $14,500.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and would like to propose a price of $13,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to come down a little further, but I'm not able to go as low as $13,000. How about $13,750? This still gives you a good deal and allows me to meet my needs. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to counter with a price of $13,500. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.
